name: [PROTOTYPE] Mech V.S Plants
description:
This is an unfinished prototype, unfortunately, I wasn't able to incoorperate the plants like I would have wanted to. I wanted the mech to have a boss fight with a monstrous plant. I plan on implementing that in the future. Though it's unfinished, I still wanted to submit something :). 

I am very new to game development, so any and all feedback is really appreciated!

CONTROLS:

[Space] - Jump

[WASD] - Move

[Left-Click] - Fires a missile
